title: Better skins for Irelia
body: Just bought my first ever skin --- Aviator Irelia.  Was actually rather disappointing, miles away from the cute girl shown on the picture...  Looks quite weird as the browny colour was really **.    Hope the other might be better.{{champion:39}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: As someone that owns every Irelia skin, they're all good. I'm totally not biased about my waifu at all. I swear.
All the others are good, you just picked the worst one

Because the current splash for that is the Chinese artwork, they simply imported that and replaced the original in an attempt to "update" it.

You should check out the original splash for Aviator Irelia.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=1051281&d=1408474837
http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20141008233653/leagueoflegends/images/0/0c/Irelia_AviatorLoading_old.jpg

Or just get the Frozbutt already.
